intro: Sons of Horus Legion armies gain 12 formation points (F/p), 14 upgrade points (U/p), 4 Titan points (T/p), and 4 Ally points (A/p) for a normal sized battle. A negative U/p value means that you gain that many upgrade points for taking a particular formation.
strategy: Legiones Astartes armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: All Legiones Astartes Detachments and Collegia Titanica Allied Banners have an initiative of 1+. Legio Cybernetica Maniples have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Cybernetica Cortex' special rule. Cthonian Headhunter Sections have an Initiative Rating of 2+, and are subject to the 'A Lean Race of Killers' special rule. Taghmata Omnissah Allied Maniples have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Malefica Mechanica' special rule.
armyRules: The And They Shall Know No Fear (ATSKNF) special rule applies to all Sons of Horus Legion Detachments.
specialRules: And They Shall Know No Fear (ATSKNF)

formations.name: Tactical Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Legion Tactical Squads
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian (1 U/p), or with a Praetor (0-1 in the army, 2 U/p)
Replace two Legion Tactical Squads with two Legion Despoiler Squads (Free), two Legion Support Squads (1 U/p), or two Legion Heavy Support Squads (2 U/p)
Add two Legion Tactical Squads (2 U/p), two Contemptor Dreadnoughts of any single configuration (2 U/p), or two Cataphractii Terminator Squads (3 U/p)

formations.name: Despoiler Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Legion Despoiler Squads
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian (1 U/p), or with a Praetor (0-1 in the army, 2 U/p)
Add two Contemptor Dreadnoughts of any single configuration (2 U/p) or two Cataphractii Terminator Squads (3 U/p)

formations.name: Mechanized Tactical Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Legion Tactical Squads, two Rhinos
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian (1 U/p), or with a Praetor (0-1 in the army, 2 U/p)
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with two Support Rhino of any single configuration: 1 U/p
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with two Land Raiders: 3 U/p
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with one Spartan of any configuration: 3 U/p

sections.name: Sons of Horus Special Detachments
sections.description: May have one Special Detachment for each Core Detachment

formations.name: Rapier Detachment
formations.units: Four Legion Rapier Laser Destroyer
extraUnits: Replace four Rapier Laser Destroyer with four Rapier Quad Launchers: 1 U/p
Add up to two Tarantulas of any configurations: 1 U/p each

formations.name: Mechanized Support Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant, four Legion Support Squads, two Rhinos
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian: 1 U/p
Replace two Legion Support Squads with two Legion Heavy Support Squads (1 U/p), or replace four Legion Support Squads with four Legion Heavy Support Squads (2 U/p)
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with two Support Rhinos of any single configuration: 1 U/p
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with two Land Raiders: 3 U/p
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with one Spartan of any configuration: 3 U/p

formations.name: Land Raider Detachment
formations.units: Two Land Raiders
extraUnits: Add one Land Raider: 2 U/p

formations.name: Predator Detachment
formations.units: Three Predators of any configurations
extraUnits: Add one Predator of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Vindicator Detachment
formations.units: Three Vindicators of any configuration
extraUnits: Add up to one Vindicator of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Assault Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Legion Assault Squads
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian: 1 U/p

formations.name: Land Speeder Detachment
formations.units: Three Land Speeders or Attack Speeders of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Land Speeder or Attack Speeder of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Sky-Hunter Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, three Sky-Hunter Squadrons

formations.name: Outrider Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Legion Outriders

sections.name: Sons of Horus Elite Detachments
sections.description: May only have one Elite Detachment for each two Core or Special Detachments

formations.name: Terminator Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, three Cataphractii Terminator Squads
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian: 1 U/p
Add one Cataphractii Terminator Squad: 2 U/p

formations.name: Destroyer Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Legion Destroyer Squads

formations.name: 0-1 Catulan Reaver Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Catulan Reaver Squads
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian: 1 U/p

formations.name: 0-1 Primarch Detachment
formations.units: Horus Lupercal, Breaker of Tyrants, three Justaerin Terminator Squads

formations.name: Leviathan Detachment
formations.units: Three Leviathan Dreadnoughts of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Leviathan Dreadnought of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Deredeo Detachment
formations.units: Three Deredeo Dreadnoughts of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Deredeo Dreadnought of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Sabre Detachment
formations.units: Three Sabre Strike Tanks of any configuration
extraUnits: Add up to three Sabre Strike Tanks of any configuration: 1 U/p each

formations.name: Kratos Detachment
formations.units: Two Kratos of any configuration

formations.name: Falchion Detachment
formations.units: One Falchion Super-Heavy Tank of any configuration

sections.name: Sons of Horus Navy Detachments
sections.description: May only have one Navy Detachment for each two Core or Special Detachments

formations.name: Storm Eagle
formations.units: One Storm Eagle

formations.name: Sokar Stormbird
formations.units: One Sokar Stormbird of any configuration

formations.name: Fire Raptor
formations.units: One Fire Raptor of any configuration

formations.name: Xiphon Interceptor
formations.units: Two Xiphon Interceptors
extraUnits: Add one additional Xiphon Interceptor: 2 U/p

sections.name: Sons of Horus Offboard Support Assets

formations.name: Warhound
formations.units: One Warhound Scout Titan
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon: 1 U/p

formations.name: Warhound Pack
formations.units: Two Warhound Scout Titans (must have the same armament)
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon: 2 U/p

formations.name: Dire Wolf
formations.units: One Dire Wolf Heavy Scout Titan
extraUnits: Replace the Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon (1 U/p) or with a Heavy Support Weapon (2 U/p)

formations.name: Reaver
formations.units: One Reaver Battle Titan
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon (1 U/p) or Heavy Support Weapon (2 U/p).
Add one Veteran Princeps character to the formation: 2 U/p

formations.name: Warlord
formations.units: One Warlord Battle Titan
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon (1 U/p) or Heavy Support Weapon (2 U/p).
Add one Veteran Princeps character to the formation: 2 U/p

sections.name: Allies: Solar Auxilia Sections
sections.description: The first formation selected must be an Auxilia Lasrifle Tercio

formations.name: Auxilia Lasrifle Tercio
formations.units: One Auxilia Captain in an Auxilia Command Squad, four Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, one Auxilia Flamer Squad
extraUnits: Replace four Auxilia Lasrifle Squads with four Auxilia Feral Squads: Free
Add three Aurox: 1 U/p

formations.name: Auxilia Dracosan Section
formations.units: One Auxilia Command Squad with an Auxilia Captain, three Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, one Dracosan - Lascannon
extraUnits: Replace three Auxilia Lasrifle Squads with three Auxilia Feral Squads: Free
Replace one Dracosan Lascannon with two Dracosan - Demolisher: 2 U/p

formations.name: Ogryn Charonite Section
formations.units: Three Charonite Ogryns
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or two Auxilia Feral Squads: 1 U/p

formations.name: Veletaris Storm Section
formations.units: Four Veletarii
extraUnits: Add two Veletarii: 2 U/p

formations.name: Auxilia Artillery Battery
formations.units: Three Basilisk and/or Medusa
extraUnits: Add one Basilisk and/or Medusa: 1 U/p

sections.name: Allies: Taghmata Omnissah Maniples
sections.description: The first formation selected must be an Adsecularis Maniple

formations.name: Adsecularis Maniple
formations.units: One Tech-Priest Auxilia, five Adsecularis Tech-Thrall Cohorts
extraUnits: Add up to two Vorax Battle-Automata Cohorts: 1 U/p each
Add two Myrmidon Secutor Hosts: 2 U/p

formations.name: Thallax Maniple
formations.units: Four Thallax Cohorts
extraUnits: Add up to two Ursarax Cohorts: 1 U/p each
Add up to two Vorax Battle-Automata Cohorts: 1 U/p each

formations.name: Castellax Maniple
formations.units: Four Castellax Battle-Automata Cohorts

formations.name: Myridon Maniple
formations.units: Four Myridon Destructors
extraUnits: Add up to two Arlatax Battle-Automata: 1 U/p each

formations.name: Arlatax Maniple
formations.units: Four Arlatax Battle-Automata
